description.value:
You spend a minute of your time studying a creature through your craft, realizing that no creation of the universe is made by accident. If you spend 1 minute studying a creature, whether through observation or conversation, you can make a Recall Knowledge check using your visionary skill. In addition to its usual outcomes, if you critically succeed, you gain a +1 status bonus to your next spell attack or spell DC against the creature. You cannot regain this benefit against the same creature for 24 hours after you use this bonus.

If you become a Master in your visionary skill, you gain this benefit if you succeed or gain a +2 status bonus if you critically succeed.
